DOC.brief_summary: Creatine ( methyl-d3 ) dilution ( D3-creatine ) novel technique estimation muscle mass . The method use dose deuterium-labelled creatine determine total skeletal muscle mass via estimation total body creatine pool size.The aim study compare estimate total body skeletal muscle mass D3-creatine dilution method whole body Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) athletic population .
DOC.brief_title: New Method Using Deuterium Labelled Creatine Measure Total Body Skeletal Muscle Mass
DOC.criteria: Trained compete elite canoe athlete recruit , represent Great Britain Canoeing Pregnant lactate woman Intolerance hypersensitivity Creatine supplementation Athletes disability affect total body muscle mass If creatine take supplemented form , rather dietary intake , regularly week within 6weeks assessment commence Contraindication MRI scan
